Package org.asteroid

Class Array

java.lang.Object
org.asteroid.Array
public class Array extends Object
Manage and perform operation based on Arrays

      arr - The array in which the specific number is to be multiplied
      d - The number that is to be multiplied to all elements
      Returns:
      A new array with that specific number multiplied to all elements of the given array
